Drug Plans Regulation
Pharmaceutical Services Act
Item
Column 1
Family Net Income ($)
(of registrant and spouse, if any)
Column 2
Family
Deductible ($)
(minister makes
no payment until
family unit pays
this amount)
Column 3
Maximum Family
Co-payment ($)
(after deductible is
paid, minister pays
70% until family
unit pays this
amount)
